owner.description: The profile that created this Group

cover.description: The cover photo of the Group

created_time.description: The time this Group was originally started

description.description: A brief description of the Group

email.description: The email address to upload content to the Group. Only current members of the Group can use this

icon.description: The URL for the Group's icon

member_count.description: Number of members of this Group

member_request_count.description: Number of people requesting to join the Group. Requires an access token of an Admin of the Group. Only returned if the number of requests is greater than 50

parent.description: The parent Group of this Group, if it exists

permissions.description: The permissions user has granted for this app in this Group

privacy.description: The privacy setting of the Group

purpose.description: The intended purpose for this Group

updated_time.description: The last time the Group was updated (this includes changes in the Group's properties and changes in posts and comments if user can see them)
